pages.text: Most spell schools from $(#524177)Iron's Spells and Spellbooks$() deal the damage type of the same name.$(2br)The Evocation Spell School deals arcane damage.$(2br)Some spell schools deal more complex damage. These include:

$(2br)$(#ffffff)The Lightning Spell School$() deals a combination of fire, nature, and holy damage. Ideal against water mobs.$(2br)$(#8200e6)The Ender Spell School$() deals a combination of arcane and blood damage.$(2br)$(#004d4d)The Eldritch Spell School$() deals a combination of blood, nature, and arcane damage.
